ygData.subject: RE: Simple Shin Shindig

ygData.messageBody:
*Aranlas rubs his chin thoughfully*

Ahh... I see.

Well, forgive the intrusion. I am naturally drawn to conspiracies, it seems.


Aranlas(If that IS his real name...)
Dealer in Conspiracy and Intrigue




-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com '
Sent: 12/6/99 4:42 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Simple Shin Shindig

From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> What was that? Sorry, I didn't catch what you said.
> *Wink* *Give secret Bard Guild sign* *mumble arcane sounding password*

ROFL....

Operaman and I have a special deal going ;)

I hate for me to look like a twinker, and I hate for him to feel
like he's not earning his stuff. In this way, we have a mutually
beneficial relationship. 'I love you man, <Sob>' hehe.

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
